meanings.sent1: The masseurs at the spa are very skilled.
meanings.sent2: I always feel relaxed after a session with the masseurs.
meanings.sent3: The masseurs joked that they had magic hands.
meanings.sent4: The masseurs' touch was like a soothing melody to my muscles.
meanings.sent5: The masseurs' expertise in relieving tension is unmatched.

meanings.sent1: We need to hire more masseurs for the event.
meanings.sent2: The group of masseurs arrived early to set up.
meanings.sent3: The masseurs formed a line to greet the guests.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of the masseurs.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the masseurs added a sense of calm to the room.
